messages.title: General Election
messages.content: The latest Scottish opinion polls are clear. Labour can't win here, it's a two horse race. Right up until 10pm on polling day, it will either be me or the SNP that wins here.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support accelerated delivery of City Deal to create growth and jobs.
Fight for local and Glasgow-wide NHS services.
Prioritise improvement of our local infrastructure including for investment in roads.
Oppose SNP's campaign for referendum on independence.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can't win here, it's a two horse race.

issues.economy: Support accelerated delivery of City Deal to create growth and jobs.
issues.health: Fight for local and Glasgow-wide NHS services.

housing.content: Prioritise improvement of our local infrastructure including for investment in roads.

quotes.text: If you want a local MP that will work tirelessly for you and make sure every penny and every promise is delivered on City Deal, every step of the way.

images.caption: Photo of candidate Taylor Muir with campaign message.
